summary: Land on homepage and view value proposition
user_story: As a developer, I want to land on a clear homepage with value proposition and API categories so that I can quickly understand what ONE LINE APIs offer.
As a developer, I want to browse API categories (Tracking, Schedules, Booking, Routes) on the homepage so that I can identify which APIs are relevant for my use case.
As a developer, I want to access a Getting Started guide so that I can learn how to obtain API credentials and make my first API call.
As a developer, I want to search for specific endpoints or use cases using a search bar so that I can quickly find the documentation I need without browsing.
As a developer, I want to browse the API reference organized by category so that I can discover all available endpoints within a specific area.
As a developer, I want to read detailed endpoint documentation including URL, HTTP method, parameters, request/response schemas, and error codes so that I can integrate it correctly.

summary: Copy code examples in multiple languages
user_story: As a developer, I want to select my programming language (curl, JavaScript, Python, Java) and copy code snippets so that I can quickly integrate the API into my application.

summary: Use sidebar navigation for API reference
user_story: As a developer, I want to use sidebar navigation to browse endpoints organized by category so that I can easily find related endpoints within a section.
As a developer, I want to use breadcrumbs and anchor links to navigate within documentation pages so that I can jump to specific sections and track my location.

summary: Search and find error code documentation
user_story: As a developer, I want to search for specific error codes or browse error documentation so that I can diagnose issues when my API calls fail.
As a developer, I want to see detailed error explanations with common causes and correct request examples so that I can fix integration issues without contacting support.

summary: Review authentication and rate limit documentation
user_story: As a developer, I want to read clear documentation about authentication requirements and rate limits so that I can implement them correctly in my application.

summary: View changelog page with API updates
user_story: As a developer, I want to visit a changelog page showing recent API updates sorted by date so that I can stay informed about new features and breaking changes.
As a developer, I want to click on a changelog entry to see detailed description, affected endpoints, and migration guide so that I can understand the impact and update my code.

summary: Navigate from changelog to updated endpoint docs
user_story: As a developer, I want to follow links from changelog entries to updated endpoint documentation so that I can see the new fields or parameters in context.
As a developer, I want to rate documentation pages (1-5 stars) using a feedback widget so that I can provide quick feedback on documentation quality.
As a developer, I want to optionally submit written feedback or suggestions so that I can provide detailed input to improve the documentation.
